metadata.title: CVE-2024-0111 on Ubuntu 22.04 FIPS Undergoing Certification (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: NVIDIA CUDA Toolkit contains a vulnerability in command 'cuobjdump' where auser may cause a crash or produce incorrect output by passing a malformedELF file. A successful exploit of this vulnerability may lead to a limiteddenial of service or data tampering.

criterions.comment: nvidia-cuda-toolkit package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
